name: Dinari ARKX
description: The Dinari ARKX dShares token (ARKX.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the ARK Space Exploration & Innovation ETF (ARKX), which focuses on companies involved in space exploration and related sectors, such as aerospace, robotics, and energy. Each ARKX.d token is fully backed by a corresponding ARKX ETF share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, ARKX.d provides seamless access to a cutting-edge sector, enabling 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
